nodes.description: 爆炸声在黑暗的酒店内响起，北约直升机尚未抵达
nodes.support_text: Explosions echoed through the darkened hotel before a Nato helicopter could be heard overhead.

nodes.description: Daood Mirakai在酒店五楼房间内滞留至烟雾从门下渗出
nodes.support_text: Daood Mirakai stayed in his fifth-floor room at the top of the hotel until smoke started seeping under the door.

nodes.description: 因担心火灾升级为烧烤式攻击，Daood Mirakai带领人员转移至地下室
nodes.support_text: I said we might as well get shot rather than get barbecued so we ran to the basement, he said.

nodes.description: 北约直升机从头顶传来声音
nodes.support_text: before a Nato helicopter could be heard overhead

edges.support_text: before a Nato helicopter could be heard overhead
